title: Piece of Love
lyrics:
[Intro: Lionel Richie]
Oh, baby, whoa
[Verse 1: Lionel Richie]
Time can heal a broken heart, whoa
But does it really ease the mind?
I know it's hard for you
Though you say you're not longing for my touch
I know it pains you much
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
What's wrong, baby?
What's on your mind?
Did you leave a piece of love behind?
What's wrong, baby?
What's on your mind?
Did you leave a piece of love behind?
[Verse 2: Lionel Richie]
Night begins with calls from you, whoa
Asking me if I'm alright
I'm really not sure, baby
I'm wondering if your love for me has gone away
Like I've heard you say
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
What's wrong, baby?
What's on your mind?
Did you leave a piece of love behind? (Oh, yeah)
What's going on, baby?
What's on your mind? (Whoa, whoa)
Did you leave a piece of love behind?

[Bridge: Lionel Richie & 
Marva King
]
It's hard to say 
(It's hard to say)
, oh, we've made mistakes
When it's not over, it's best to put pride away
Two eyes should not cry the tears of regret
'Cause two lips won't let go of an age old lover's lie 
(Lie)
Oh, baby, oh
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
What's wrong, baby?
What's on your mind?
Did you leave a piece of love behind?
What's going on, baby?
What is on your mind? (Whoa, whoa)
Did you leave a piece of love behind?
[Outro: Lionel Richie]
I'd do anything for you, I'll give you all my heart
Whoa, did you leave a piece of love behind?
Oh, did you leave your love behind?
